verses.verse: And it came to pass, when men <WH120> began <WH2490> <WH8689> to multiply <WH7231> <WH8800> on <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>, and daughters <WH1323> were born <WH3205> <WH8795> unto them,

That the sons <WH1121> of 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the daughters <WH1323> of men <WH120> that they <WH2007> were fair <WH2896>; and they took <WH3947> <WH8799> them wives <WH802> of all which they chose <WH977> <WH8804>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, My spirit <WH7307> shall not always <WH5769> strive <WH1777> <WH8799> with man <WH120>, for that he also <WH1571> <WH8677> <WH7683> <WH8800> is flesh <WH1320>: yet his days <WH3117> shall be an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141>.

There were giants <WH5303> in the earth <WH776> in those days <WH3117>; and also after <WH310> that <WH3651>, when <WH834> the sons <WH1121> of 'Elohim <WH430> came in <WH935> <WH8799> unto the daughters <WH1323> of men <WH120>, and they bare <WH3205> <WH8804> children to them, the same <WH1992> became mighty men <WH1368> which were of old <WH5769>, men <WH582> of renown <WH8034>.

And GOD <WH3068> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that the wickedness <WH7451> of man <WH120> was great <WH7227> in the earth <WH776>, and that every imagination <WH3336> of the thoughts <WH4284> of his heart <WH3820> was only <WH7535> evil <WH7451> continually <WH3117>.
And it repented <WH5162> <WH8735> the YY <WH3068> that he had made <WH6213> <WH8804> man <WH120> on the earth <WH776>, and it grieved <WH6087> <WH8691> him at <WH413> his heart <WH3820>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will destroy <WH4229> <WH8799> man <WH120> whom I have created <WH1254> <WH8804> from the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>; both man <WH120>, and <WH5704> beast <WH929>, and the creeping thing <WH7431>, and the fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>; for it repenteth <WH5162> <WH8738> me that I have made <WH6213> <WH8804> them.
But Noach <WH5146> found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in the eyes <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>.

These are the generations <WH8435> of Noach <WH5146>: Noach <WH5146> was a just <WH6662> man <WH376> and perfect <WH8549> in his generations <WH1755>, and Noach <WH5146> walked <WH1980> <WH8694> with 'Elohim <WH430>.
And Noach <WH5146> begat <WH3205> <WH8686> three <WH7969> sons <WH1121>, Shem <WH8035>, Ham <WH2526>, and Yefet <WH3315>.
The earth <WH776> also was corrupt <WH7843> <WH8735> before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH430>, and the earth <WH776> was filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with violence <WH2555>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> looked <WH7200> <WH8799> upon the earth <WH776>, and, behold, it was corrupt <WH7843> <WH8738>; for all flesh <WH1320> had corrupted <WH7843> <WH8689> his way <WH1870> upon the earth <WH776>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Noach <WH5146>, The end <WH7093> of all flesh <WH1320> is come <WH935> <WH8804> before me <WH6440>; for the earth <WH776> is filled with <WH4390> <WH8804> violence <WH2555> through them <WH6440>; and, behold, I will destroy <WH7843> <WH8688> them with <WH854> the earth <WH776>.

Make <WH6213> <WH8798> thee an ark <WH8392> of gopher <WH1613> wood <WH6086>; rooms <WH7064> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> in <WH854> the ark <WH8392>, and shalt pitch <WH3722> <WH8804> it within <WH1004> and without <WH2351> with pitch <WH3724>.

And this is the fashion which thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> it of: The length <WH753> of the ark <WH8392> shall be three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>, the breadth <WH7341> of it fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the height <WH6967> of it thirty <WH7970> cubits <WH520>.

A window <WH6672> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> to the ark <WH8392>, and in a cubit <WH520> shalt thou finish <WH3615> <WH8762> it above <WH4605>; and the door <WH6607> of the ark <WH8392> shalt thou set <WH7760> <WH8799> in the side thereof <WH6654>; with lower <WH8482>, second <WH8145>, and third <WH7992> stories shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> it.

And, behold <WH2009>, I <WH589>, even I, do bring <WH935> <WH8688> a flood <WH3999> of waters <WH4325> upon the earth <WH776>, to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> all flesh <WH1320>, wherein is the breath <WH7307> of life <WH2416>, from under <WH8478> heaven <WH8064>; and every thing <WH3605> that is in the earth <WH776> shall die <WH1478> <WH8799>.

But with thee will I establish <WH6965> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285>; and thou shalt come <WH935> <WH8804> into <WH413> the ark <WH8392>, thou <WH859>, and thy sons <WH1121>, and thy wife <WH802>, and thy sons <WH1121> ' wives <WH802> with thee.

And of every living thing <WH2416> of all flesh <WH1320>, two <WH8147> of every sort shalt thou bring <WH935> <WH8686> into the ark <WH8392>, to keep them alive <WH2421> <WH8687> with thee; they shall be male <WH2145> and female <WH5347>.

Of fowls <WH5775> after their kind <WH4327>, and of cattle <WH929> after their kind <WH4327>, of every creeping thing <WH7431> of the earth <WH127> after his kind <WH4327>, two <WH8147> of every sort shall come <WH935> <WH8799> unto thee, to keep them alive <WH2421> <WH8687>.

And take <WH3947> <WH8798> thou unto thee of all food <WH3978> that is eaten <WH398> <WH8735>, and thou shalt gather <WH622> <WH8804> it to thee; and it shall be for food <WH402> for thee, and for them.
Thus did <WH6213> <WH8799> Noach <WH5146>; according to all that 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him, so did <WH6213> <WH8804> he.
